plot: Daytime version, this time featuring four Bed & Breakfast owning couples, one venue each day of the week, with the final day reserved for feedback debates and announcement of the winner.
plot_en: Daytime version, this time featuring four Bed & Breakfast owning couples, one venue each day of the week, with the final day reserved for feedback debates and announcement of the winner.

title: Four in a Bed
